english.segment1: With eyes so blind. How did I see a single thing?. I missed the scenery. Change in front of me
english.segment2: And as for these hands. Well they've got a lot to answer for. They built me a house of sand. On someone else's land
english.segment3: Deep down I knew I was lost. But I kept my fingers crossed. As if that would somehow rescue me
english.segment4: Chorus: How did I sleep?. How did I sleep?. How did I sleep without You?. Without You
english.segment5: Tired all the time. But there is no rest for the wicked. Under the covers I pretended not to cry
english.segment6: And there You were: Magnified by the tears. Reaching Your hands to me. Waiting patiently
english.segment7: I never dared to dream. Of the morning my eyes have seen. Awake for the first time: rise and shine
